Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool)

The Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool) operates efficiently thanks to its strong cooling capacity of 24000 BTU and low power input. With an Energy Efficiency Ratio (EER) of 2.93, this Haier 2-Ton AC uses less energy while still providing sufficient cooling, making it both economical and environmentally friendly. It can be used in a range of electrical configurations thanks to its 8.2A running current and compatibility with a 1-phase, 220V, 50Hz power supply. The Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool) ensures rapid and even cooling across the room with an air circulation capacity of 900 m3/h. By using R32 refrigerant, it maximizes cooling performance while minimizing its impact on the environment. Additionally, the Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool) has a hidden LED display that adds a touch of sophistication to its otherwise understated design.

1 Minute Instant Cooling

All it takes to quickly cool down the Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool) is one minute of the "Turbo/Quiet" button pressing on the remote controller.

Up to 54°C Cooling

With its innovative design and enhanced conformal coating, the Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool) protects its components from a range of elements that could otherwise decrease their lifespan, keeping you cool even at temperatures as high as 54°C.

Quality Dust Filter

Use the Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool) premium dust filter to protect it. To efficiently keep tiny dust particles, insects, and other objects out of the room, use a 2-ton non-inverter air conditioner.

100% Grooved Copper

Unexpected damages can be prevented with the Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool), extending the compressor's lifespan. To improve the area of contact between the copper pipe and refrigerant gas, Haier copper pipe has grooves in its interior slots. The heat exchange efficiency has increased by 30 to 50% respectively.

Hydrophilic Aluminum Blue Fin

Haier's condenser and evaporator, featuring the Haier 2 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type HSU-24TurboCool) hydrophilic aluminum bluefin and new generation plastic outlet grid, top the industry in corrosion resistance and super cooling performance.
